class.name: TestProblem4

javadoc.text:
This class is used in the junit tests for the ODE integrators. *

This specific problem is the following differential equation : * 

 * x'' = -x
 *
* And when x decreases down to 0, the state should be changed as follows : * 
 * x' -> -x'
 *
* The theoretical solution of this problem is x = |sin(t+a)| *

method.name: eventOccurred
method.comment: this sign change is needed because the state will be reset soon
